org.apache.openjpa.lib.jdbc
Interface JDBCListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractJDBCListener
public interface JDBCListener

A listener for all JDBCEvents that occur.

Author:
Marc Prud'hommeaux, Abe White
See Also:
